duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and lead a diverse team of Account Executives to increase pipeline within customer base and acquire new logos.
Lead complex sales cycles and develop strategic account plans to drive business growth.
Establish and nurture relationships with executives, stakeholders, and key influencers.
Participate in strategic and tactical planning for the sales team and region.
Achieve and exceed sales targets through successful revenue attainment.
Communicate, negotiate, and assist Account Executives in closing deals with key executives and stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: BS or BA degree or equivalent work-related work experience
